Author: ashu
Content:
Thinking that getting a good lawyer will get you investment is fallacy. The only thing that gets you an investor is showing traction and having a business model (at some point in the future, at least.)

That said, having a good lawyer is important just for legal reasons and because the lawyer can foresee complex situations (founders splitting up and so on) that you wouldn't.

Author: run4yourlives
Content: Personally, I'm a big fan of the "Don't call me unless I know you" ethic.

Author: bootload
Content:
"10 spock invites" and no link with invites or email address is ill-logical. Having received personal spock invite via email is not

having said that, here's my first impression

- signup: email + firstname + lastname

- find friends: plaxo, gmail, gmail, aol, yahoo, hotmail \n - control identity: works off existing social sites (myspace, linkedin, \nfriendster sites, gmail, yahoo & aol email)

- log in, pwd

- vote on if details are correct (social voting on your details?)

- add personal info ... tags, sites, bio, name, age, dob, address

Searching: Ho hum. Lots of dead people are listed. Quick search on names I found lots of inflated cv-like & MySpace entries. Maybe thats why the vote is added to allow checks & balances to occur. Laugh at people who are not me.

Author: run4yourlives
Content: I know, I was just teasing you... hence the emoction.
